response.overview: Burned Edges is a culinary drama about ambition pushed too far.  Inside the relentless heat of a pizza kitchen, a driven chef sacrifices sleep, love, and loyalty in pursuit of greatness slowly burning the very relationships that once grounded him.  Itâ€™s a story about overwork, obsession, and the cost of chasing a dream without knowing when to stop.
response.tagline: Is not perfect, is just pizza.
response.title: Burned Edges
